title: Tasty Quick Stir Fry Rice with Chicken
content:
Super easy and quick to make stir fry rice for kids. This recipe can be made using leftover cooked rice and chicken. A great recipe to put in kids lunch box.

This stir fry rice is super easy to make and it tastes amazing. You can add cooked veggies instead of chicken in this. You can skip the eggs in this too.

 

Stir Fry Rice for Kids

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Cooked Rice - 1 cup

Eggs - 2

Cooked Chicken - ½ cup shredded

Sweet corn - ¼ cup (frozen, thawed)

Spinach - ½ cup roughly chopped

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Butter - 2 tablespoons

 

Instructions

Mix eggs with salt and pepper and mix well.

Heat butter in a pan.

Add in cooked rice and stir fry for 1 min.

Add in spinach, chicken and sweet corn and stir fry for 5 mins.

Now add in the egg mixture and stir fry for 6 to 8 mins till the eggs are fried well.

Serve it.

Tasty Chicken Burger Recipe
recommendations.content:
The delicious and juicy chicken burger which is not only tasty but is super easy to make. This burger makes a great lunch or dinner.
The super delicious spicy burger which is perfect to pack in a lunch box or taste amazing for dinner too.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
